member.summary: Defines the api required to access Dialogic Springware boards

member.name: M:com.makarosoft.voice.plugin.dialogic.Dialogic.flushDigitBuffer(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns every character including the terminator
member.returns: All the digits in the buffer including terminators
member.param: The handle for the Dialogic line.

member.name: M:com.makarosoft.voice.plugin.dialogic.Dialogic.getDigits(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Keep prompting for digits until number of digits is pressed or a terminator digit is pressed.
member.returns: Returns the digits pressed not including the terminator if there was one
member.param: The handle for the Dialogic line.
Maximum number of digits allowed in the buffer.
